meaningMnemonic: Long ago, under a <radical>canopy</radical>, a <radical>wolverine</radical> opened its <radical>mouth</radical> and uttered a single word: "<kanji>China</kanji>." Thus China was born, all of <kanji>sudden</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Believe it or not, this <kanji>sudden</kanji> invention of <kanji>China</kanji> happened in <reading>とう</reading>きょう. Well, it wasn't とうきょう yet. And it was a traveling wolverine from China who did it. I mean, it wasn't China yet either… But you know legends, they're just all over the place.
